评论详情: My teen loves this shirt. The graphic images are exactly as pictured. It runs wide and short. She wears an XS-S and I ordered a medium. It is wide but not long. She likes these shirts very oversized. She is just shy of being 5’2” and it just covers her butt.  The fabric is breathable and feels similar (but cheaper) to a moisture-wicking fabric. It is white inside and black outside. In other words, it is a cheap fabric and hopefully won’t pill up fast.
